textContent:
Only God knows if we ever get to meet in person or will things end even before I could see you right in your eyes, feel your skin against mine or even get a chance to breathe the same air as yours ðŸ¥º

I don't have any idea as of now that how are things going to work out, I don't want to give up on us Umair, joh couples ke beech itne sare problems hote unko tak lgta hai ki sath reh kr sb thik ho jayega, just imagine how happy and at peace we both would be if we get to stay together ðŸ¥º 

Few months back, every night, I used to imagine the very same image of us meeting at the airport and it would feel so overwhelming ki kya hi batayen ðŸ¤§ 
The way I look for you in the crowd and the moment I find you and come running to you, we look into each other's eyes and pause for a minute or two, then come closer, we get emotional and hug each other, that one hug and it takes away all the pain, hardships and chaos we've dealth with! 
I start crying, you wipe my tears then we laugh later I take you to the cab, there you hold my hands for the first time, that feeling would be out of the world ðŸ¥º we get into our hotel room or our home, we sit together, first at distance then slowly we come closer and then we never ever leave each other's company ðŸ˜­ I want to be with you every single minute that's how much I love you! ðŸ¥ºðŸ©·

I hope and pray that God listens to us. ðŸ¥º
title: Open when you're imagining our first meeting.
textContentHtml:
Only God knows if we ever get to meet in person or will things end even before I could see you right in your eyes, feel your skin against mine or even get a chance to breathe the same air as yours ðŸ¥º


I don't have any idea as of now that how are things going to work out, I don't want to give up on us Umair, joh couples ke beech itne sare problems hote unko tak lgta hai ki sath reh kr sb thik ho jayega, just imagine how happy and at peace we both would be if we get to stay together ðŸ¥º 


Few months back, every night, I used to imagine the very same image of us meeting at the airport and it would feel so overwhelming ki kya hi batayen ðŸ¤§ 

The way I look for you in the crowd and the moment I find you and come running to you, we look into each other's eyes and pause for a minute or two, then come closer, we get emotional and hug each other, that one hug and it takes away all the pain, hardships and chaos we've dealth with! 

I start crying, you wipe my tears then we laugh later I take you to the cab, there you hold my hands for the first time, that feeling would be out of the world ðŸ¥º we get into our hotel room or our home, we sit together, first at distance then slowly we come closer and then we never ever leave each other's company ðŸ˜­ I want to be with you every single minute that's how much I love you! ðŸ¥ºðŸ©·


I hope and pray that God listens to us. ðŸ¥º
